apiClassifier.shortdesc: The types of updates that a user or a contact can make to their BBM profile.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc:
The types of updates that a user or a contact can make to their BBM profile.
Update types are used to determine which property was updated when a BBMContactEvent event is dispatched.

apiValue.shortdesc: Indicates that the display name has changed.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Indicates that the display name has changed.

apiValue.shortdesc: Indicates that the display picture has changed.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Indicates that the display picture has changed.

apiValue.shortdesc: Indicates that your app was installed/enabled.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Indicates that your app was installed/enabled.

apiValue.shortdesc: Indicates that the personal message has changed.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Indicates that the personal message has changed.

apiValue.shortdesc: Indicates that the status has changed.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Indicates that the status has changed.

apiValue.shortdesc: Indicates that your app was uninstalled/disabled.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Indicates that your app was uninstalled/disabled.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: Represents the device User in the BBM Social Platform.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc:
Represents the device User in the BBM Social Platform.
BBMUserProfile is a class that represents the device user in the BBM Social Platform. The class provides getters and setters to attributes of the device User.

apiParam.apiDesc: The id of the user.
The name of the user.
The message of the user.
The status message of the user.
The app version the user has installed.
The status of the user.
The url for the profile image of the user.

apiConstructorDetail.apiDesc:
Creates a BBMUserProfile instance.
BBMUserProfile instances are created by the BBMManager class and should not be directly instaniated.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Set the personal message of the user.

apiReturn.apiDesc: Returns BBMResult.ASYNC if successful in sending the request, otherwise BBMResult.FAILURE.

apiParam.apiDesc: The message to set.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc:
Set the personal message of the user.
When setting the personal message a dialog displays to allow the user to accept or reject the change. A personal message is limited to 160 characters; anything longer is truncated. If null is passed in, the personal message is cleared.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Sets the url of the profile image for the user.

apiReturn.apiDesc: Returns BBMResult.ASYNC if successful in sending the request, otherwise BBMResult.FAILURE.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc:
Sets the url of the profile image for the user.
When setting the profile url, the image is uploaded to the BBM Social Platform servers. A dialog displays to allow the user to accept or reject the change to the user's BBM display picture. The display picture is limited to 32kB of data; an attempt to set a display picture that exceeds this limit will fail and will not display the dialog.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Sets the status of the user.

apiReturn.apiDesc: Returns BBMResult.ASYNC if successful in sending the request, otherwise BBMResult.FAILURE.

apiParam.apiDesc: The status of the user. Valid values can be found in the BBMContactStatus class.
The personal status of the user.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Sets the status of the user.

apiValue.shortdesc: Gets the version of the application installed.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Gets the version of the application installed.

apiValue.shortdesc: Get the display name of the user.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Get the display name of the user.

apiValue.shortdesc: Get the id of the user.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Get the id of the user.

apiValue.shortdesc: Get the personal message of the user.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Get the personal message of the user.

apiValue.shortdesc: Get or set the personal status of the user.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Get or set the personal status of the user.

apiValue.shortdesc: Gets the url of the profile image for the user.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Gets the url of the profile image for the user.

apiValue.shortdesc: Gets or sets the users status.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc:
Gets or sets the users status.
Valid values can be found in the BBMContactStatus class.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: Represents a contact in the BBM Social Platform.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc:
Represents a contact in the BBM Social Platform.
BBMContact is a class that represents a contact accessible through the BBM Social Platform. The class provides accessor methods to the main attributes of the contact including display name, message and status.

apiParam.apiDesc: The id of the contact.
The name of the contact.
The message of the contact.
The status message of the contact.
The app version the contact has installed.
The status of the contact.
The url for the profile image of the contact.

apiConstructorDetail.apiDesc:
Creates a BBMContact instance.
BBMContact instances are created by the BBMManager class and should not be directly instaniated.

apiValue.shortdesc: Retrieve a contact's version of the app that they have installed.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Retrieve a contact's version of the app that they have installed.

apiValue.shortdesc: Retrieve a contact's display name.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Retrieve a contact's display name.

apiValue.shortdesc: Retrieve a contact's id.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc:
Retrieve a contact's id.
The user's PPID is the same across multiple instances of BBM (for example, on a BlackBerry smartphone and a BlackBerry tablet), when the user signs in with the same BlackBerry ID. The ID is encoded as a Base64 string using the ASCII character set.

apiValue.shortdesc: Retrieve a contact's personal message.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Retrieve a contact's personal message.

apiValue.shortdesc: Retrieve a contact's status message.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Retrieve a contact's status message.

apiValue.shortdesc: Retrieve the url for a contact's profile image.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Retrieve the url for a contact's profile image.

apiValue.shortdesc: Retrieve a contact's status.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc:
Retrieve a contact's status.
Valid values can be found in the BBMContactStatus class.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: The BBMManager class is used to interact with the BBM Social Platform.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc:
The BBMManager class is used to interact with the BBM Social Platform.
For example, you can:
Invite BBM contacts to download your app by accessing a user's BBM contact list.
Update a user's BBM personal message, status, and avatar.
Add a customizable application box to a user's BBM profile to broadcast achievements or provide updates.
Applications wishing to use the BBMManager must ensure that their application includes the following permission in their bar-descriptor.xml file.
<permission>bbm_connect</permission>
Connecting to the BBM Social Platform starts with registering your app. The BBM Social Platform APIs are not generally available for use until the app is registered. Successful registration is indicated when BBMRegisterEvent.SUCCESS event is recieved.

adobeApiEvent.shortdesc: Dispatched when the user profile is updated.

adobeApiEventDetail.apiDesc: Dispatched when the user profile is updated.

adobeApiEvent.shortdesc: Dispatched when access to the BBM Social Platform is denied.

adobeApiEventDetail.apiDesc:
Dispatched when access to the BBM Social Platform is denied.
This is usually the result of the user turning off BBM in the application permissions.

adobeApiEvent.shortdesc: Dispatched when the application is not registered with the BBM Social Platform.

adobeApiEventDetail.apiDesc: Dispatched when the application is not registered with the BBM Social Platform.

adobeApiEvent.shortdesc: Dispatched when the application is in the process of registering with the BBM Social Platform.

adobeApiEventDetail.apiDesc: Dispatched when the application is in the process of registering with the BBM Social Platform.

adobeApiEvent.shortdesc: Dispatched when the application has successfully registered with the BBM Social Platform.

adobeApiEventDetail.apiDesc: Dispatched when the application has successfully registered with the BBM Social Platform.

adobeApiEvent.shortdesc: Dispatched when a contact is updated.

adobeApiEventDetail.apiDesc: Dispatched when a contact is updated.

adobeApiEvent.shortdesc: Dispatched when the contact list is retrieved from the BBM Social Platform servers.

adobeApiEventDetail.apiDesc: Dispatched when the contact list is retrieved from the BBM Social Platform servers.

apiParam.apiDesc: The singleton enforcer to help prevent accidental instaniation of this class directly.

apiConstructorDetail.apiDesc:
Do not call directly.
Use the BBMManager.bbmManager property to return the singelton instance of this class.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Add an item to a user's profile box.

asCustoms.returns: Returns one of the values defined in BBMResult.

apiParam.apiDesc: The item text must not be null or empty. It can have a maximum of 100 characters, with no more than 2 new line characters.
The cookie can be null, with a maximum of 128 characters.
Must be that of a registered image, or < 0 if this item has no image.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc:
Add an item to a user's profile box.
A profile box item consists of an image, text, and a customizable string (cookie).

apiOperation.shortdesc: Determine whether this user has allowed other users of this application to send this user invitations to become a BBM contact.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc:
Determine whether this user has allowed other users of this application to send this user invitations to become a BBM contact.
This function will return an accurate value only if you have access to the BBM Social Platform (i.e. if isAccessAllowed() returns true).
The user can modify this permission through the global settings application.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Determine whether the user has allowed this application and its application activities to appear in their BBM profile.

apiReturn.apiDesc: Returns true if profile box items can be shown.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc:
Determine whether the user has allowed this application and its application activities to appear in their BBM profile.
You can use this function to determine whether your profile box is being displayed on the user's profile. This function will return an accurate value only if you have access to the BBM Social Platform (i.e. if isAccessAllowed() returns true).
The user can modify this permission through the global settings application.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Retrieve the user's BBM profile information.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Retrieve the user's BBM profile information.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Determine whether access to the BBM Social Platform is allowed.

apiReturn.apiDesc: Returns true is access is allowed.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc:
Determine whether access to the BBM Social Platform is allowed.
Access is not allowed until a successful registration has taken place.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Register your app with the BBM Social Platform.

apiParam.apiDesc: The application's uuid.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc:
Register your app with the BBM Social Platform.
A UUID is a unique, 128-bit, 36-character identifier that you generate for your app using a UUID generator. The UUID string must conform to the Microsoft 8-4-4-4-12 format (xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx).
A progress registration dialog may appear in your application after you invoke this function. The user will be able to cancel the registration by dismissing the dialog. Once the registration is completed, a system toast may appear indicating to the user that your application is now connected to BBM.
If BBM is not setup when registration starts, the user may decide to setup BBM. This action will trigger the registration to resume.
BBMRegisterEvent events are dispatched during the registration process.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Register an image with the BBM Social Platform for use with profile box items.

asCustoms.returns: Returns one of the values defined in BBMResult.

apiParam.apiDesc: The file path to the image. For example, File.applicationDirectory.resolvePath("assets/apple.png").nativePath
The unique ID of the image. Must be > 0.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc:
Register an image with the BBM Social Platform for use with profile box items.
Registering an image uploads it to the user's BlackBerry device for use when the app is not running. This process takes place asynchronously. Images should be registered using the same ID on different devices and in different versions of your app because images are distributed on a peer-to-peer basis between devices.
If canShowProfileBox() returns false, this method will return BBMResult.FAILURE.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Remove all items in the profile box from the user's BlackBerry device.

asCustoms.returns: Returns one of the values defined in BBMResult.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc:
Remove all items in the profile box from the user's BlackBerry device.
This process takes place asynchronously. If canShowProfileBox() returns false, this method will return BBMResult.FAILURE.
Once the items are removed the profileBoxItems list is automatically updated.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Remove a profile box item from the user's BBM profile box.

asCustoms.returns: Returns one of the values defined in BBMResult.

apiParam.apiDesc: The id of the item to remove.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc:
Remove a profile box item from the user's BBM profile box.
This process takes place asynchronously. If canShowProfileBox() returns false, this method will return BBMResult.FAILURE.
Once the item is removed the profileBoxItems list is automatically updated.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Returns true if a download invitation can be sent.

apiReturn.apiDesc: Returns true if inviations can be sent.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc:
Returns true if a download invitation can be sent.
This method will always return false before a successful registration.

apiValue.shortdesc: Returns the singelton instance of BBMManager

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Returns the singelton instance of BBMManager

apiValue.shortdesc: Returns a list of BBM contacts that have the application installed.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc:
Returns a list of BBM contacts that have the application installed.
The IDataProvider list is populated with BBMContact objects.
It is important that you do not modify this list in any way. The list of contacts is managed strictly by this class. Modifiying the list could lead to potential issues.

apiValue.shortdesc: Returns a list of user profile box items for the current user.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc:
Returns a list of user profile box items for the current user.
The IDataProvider list is populated with BBMProfileBoxItem objects.
In order to access the users profile box items, the canShowProfileBox() method must return true.
It is important that you do not modify this list in any way. The list of profile box items is managed strictly by this class. Modifiying the list could lead to potential issues.

apiValue.shortdesc: Gets the version number of the BBM Social Platform.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc:
Gets the version number of the BBM Social Platform.
Retrieves the version of the BBM Social Platform library that your application is using. You can use the version number to check whether your application is compatible with this version of the BBM Social Platform.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: Represents a profile box item in the BBM Social Platform.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc:
Represents a profile box item in the BBM Social Platform.
BBMProfileBoxItem is a class that represents a profile box item accessible through the BBM Social Platform. The class provides accessor methods to the main attributes of the ProfileBoxItem including cookie, id, iconId and text.

apiParam.apiDesc: The id of the item.
The text of the item.
The cookie of the item.
The icon id of the item.
The url of the icon.

apiConstructorDetail.apiDesc:
Creates a BBMProfileBoxItem instance.
BBMProfileBoxItem instances are created by the BBMManager class and should not be directly instaniated.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Retrieves the icon from the BBM Social Platform.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc:
Retrieves the icon from the BBM Social Platform.
Retrieving the icon occurs asynchronously and once completed the iconUrl property is updated.

apiValue.shortdesc: Retrieve the cookie of the item.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Retrieve the cookie of the item.

apiValue.shortdesc: Retrieve the icon id of the item.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Retrieve the icon id of the item.

apiValue.shortdesc: Retrieve the url for the icon of the item.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc:
Retrieve the url for the icon of the item.
If null, application developers should call theretrieveIcon() icon method in order to get the url to the icon. When the icon url is retrieved, this property is automatically updated with the url.

apiValue.shortdesc: Retrieve the id of the item.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Retrieve the id of the item.

apiValue.shortdesc: Retrieve the text of the item.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Retrieve the text of the item.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: Represents the status of the device User or a BBMContact.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: Represents the status of the device User or a BBMContact.

apiValue.shortdesc: User status that indicates that the user is available.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: User status that indicates that the user is available.

apiValue.shortdesc: User status that indicates that the user is busy.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: User status that indicates that the user is busy.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: Result codes that can be returned by a function.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: Result codes that can be returned by a function.

apiValue.shortdesc: Indicates that an operation will be completed asynchronously.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Indicates that an operation will be completed asynchronously.

apiValue.shortdesc: Indicates that a function did not complete successfully.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Indicates that a function did not complete successfully.
